result.title: MindCoding 2nd Round 2017
result.content:
Hi, dear friends,

It's a pleasure to announce you that the second MindCoding round for both Div.1 and Div.2 of 2017's Edition will take place on Thursday, March 23. We are currently making every effort for this edition to be a successfull one and you are welcome to join our community. MindCoding is a high-performing international coding competition, structured in 4 online rounds & 1 final stage, that'll take place in Cluj-Napoca, Romania, between 28th-30th of April 2017.

The second round will last 90 minutes and the contest has the same structure as the first round (and the following two qualification rounds), consisting of 4 problems of scores ranging between 100 and 1000 which will decrease in time. We remind you that the total score to be counted towards qualification in the final round will be computed as the sum of each participant's score in all the 1st division rounds they competed in.

If you haven't participated during the first round, you are welcome to take part in the upcoming MindCoding rounds and fight for your spot in the finals! You are just starting out :) ****

If you were asking yourself about this year's prizes, chances are you are convinced that it's worth your time now.

The team which is making sure you are having a great experience during 2017's MindCoding Edition: ****

Cosmin Rusu (cr.rusucosmin) — project coordinator

Sergiu Pușcaș (Sergiu)

Marius Gavrilescu (mgv) — the creator of our platform

Gabriel Ineluș (gabrielinelus)

Bianca Costin (o_mic)

Casian Marc (marccasiannicolae)

Alexandru Ionita (juve45)

Camelia Hanes (gcatdrey)

Bereczki Norbert (bnorbertcristian)

George Linut (Browser007)

Alexandru Vasiu (alex.vasiu)

We are expressing our warmest congratulations to last year's participants and finalists: ****

Bohdan Pryshchenko(I_love_Tanya_Romanova) — The winner of 2016's MindCoding Edition

Andrei Stanciu (shobe)

Mircea Popoveniuc (mirceadino)

Yury Pisarchyk (Ra16bit)

Here are our memories at the Awards Ceremony during the finals of last year's Edition that we want to share with you: ****

More details about the time and date of the contest in your region can be found on our online platform (https://mindcoding.ro/) , where you will also find the timeline for the next rounds.

P.S.: We encourage you to warm up and practice some problems which you can find on the same page, get familiar with the environment, bring up your passion for algorithms. Moreover, don't forget to create an account if you haven't done that yet, to avoid the rush of registering right before the contest starts.

Find us on our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/mindcodingcluj/ feel free to contact us and join our community.

We wish you the best of luck and a high score! See you at the finals!
